Module universityProject
Package communicationsPackage

Class Message

java.lang.Object
communicationsPackage.Message
public class Message extends Object
The Message class represents a communication message, including its type, topic, urgency, text content, and sender.

Messages can vary in type, topic, and urgency levels, and are sent by employees within the system.

This class offers constructors and methods for accessing and modifying the properties of a message.

Since:
2023-01-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
